<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>10399</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Morality - Quiz</string>
            <string language="es">Moral - Cuestionario</string>
            <string language="ga">Moráltacht – Tráth na gCeist</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sittlichkeitsgefühl - Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Moralité - Jeu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Morality - Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Moralità - Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηθική - διαγωνισμός γνώσεων</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will have assessed their level of knowledge having studied morality.</string>
            <string language="es">Los estudiantes valorarán su nivel de conocimientos una vez que hayan estudiado moral.</string>
            <string language="ga">Beidh na daltaí tar éis measúnú a dhéanamh ar leibhéal a n-eolas tar éis dóibh staidéar a dhéanamh ar mhoráltacht.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Religious Education</string>
            <string language="es">Educación religiosa</string>
            <string language="ga">Oideachas Reiligiúnach</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer haben ihre Stufe des Wissens 
Sittlichkeitsgefühl studierend festgesetzt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants auront évalué leur niveau de la 
connaissance ayant étudié la moralité.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes terão avaliado seu nível do 
conhecimento que estuda o morality.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi avranno valutato il loro livello di 
conoscenza che studia la moralità.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα έχουν αξιολογήσει το επίπεδο γνώσης 
τους μελετώντας την ηθική.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Religionserziehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éducation Religieuse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instrução Religiosa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione Religiosa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θρησκευτική εκπαίδευση</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>

            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
